title: Hollywood's Biggest Wedding of the Year Crashes Social Media Platforms
introText: The wedding of two A-list celebrities crashed Instagram and Twitter as fans flooded platforms to see photos. The lavish Italian ceremony has been called the wedding of the decade.

content.content: When the couple posted their first wedding photo, Instagram and Twitter experienced outages lasting 30 minutes. The image became the most-liked post in social media history within hours.
The wedding took place at a 16th-century Italian villa with 400 guests including Hollywood royalty, musicians, and world leaders. The event reportedly cost $15 million.
The wedding dominated global conversation for days, demonstrating the continued power of celebrity culture even in an era of fragmented media attention.

summary: A-list celebrity wedding crashes Instagram and Twitter, becoming the most-liked post and dominating global conversation.
